newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria's Stoyanov wins 61.9 pct - prelim result.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria's Stoyanov wins 61.9 pct - prelim result.

text.p: Bulgarian opposition candidate Petar Stoyanov is leading with 61.9 percent in Sunday's presidential election run-off to 38.1 percent for Ivan Marazov of the ruling Socialists, official preliminary results showed.
An electoral commission spokeswoman said results from about a quarter of the polling stations had been counted.
Stoyanov told a victory news conference he planned to bring Bulgaria closer to the European Union and to NATO.
Socialist Prime Minister Zhan Videnov called Stoyanov's victory "an impressive win" and pledged a thorough policy overhaul early next year.
Final official results are expected by Wednesday.
